documentation.title: Removed Dollar Brace String Embeds
documentation.standard:
Detect use of select forms of variable embedding in double quoted texts strings and heredocs which are deprecated since PHP 8.2.
Until PHP 8.2, PHP allowed embedding variables in strings with double-quotes (") and heredocs in four different ways: 1. Directly embedding variables (`$foo`) 2. Braces outside the variable (`{$foo}`) 3. Braces after the dollar sign (`${foo}`) 4. Variable variables (`${expr}`, equivalent to `(string) ${expr}`)
As of PHP 8.2, embedding variables and expressions using the syntaxes as per option 3 and 4 is deprecated.

code.title: Cross-version compatible: Embedding simple variables and complex expressions in text strings using plain variables or the `{$...}` syntax.
PHP < 8.2: Embedding simple variables and complex expressions in text strings using the `${...}` syntax
